cast.original_title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
cast.overview: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.
cast.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

details.biography: Forba Shepherd is a Stage, Film and Commercial Actress. She portrayed Ted Bundy's Mother in the Movie, "Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile". She played the Mother in the Independent Film,"Mr. Not Too Bad". Forba was Elizabeth McGovern's Stand-In for the Hallmark Hall of Fame Movie,"The Flamingo Rising". During her seven years In NYC, she was a working Actress in Plays, Film, Television, Commercials and a member of the Political Comedy Group, "Turn Left". Forba has lived in Miami, Orlando and St. Augustine, Florida, Sydney, Australia, Arona, Italy, NYC, NJ and Indianapolis, Indiana.
details.name: Forba Shepherd
